x0.name: Burning Blood
x0.description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.

x1.name: Ring of the Snake
x1.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

x3.name: Ancient Tea Set
x3.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 Energy.

x4.name: Art of War
x4.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.

x5.name: Bag of Marbles
x5.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

x6.name: Bag of Preparation
x6.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

x7.name: Blood Vial
x7.description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

x8.name: Bronze Scales
x8.description: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.

x9.name: Dream Catcher
x9.description: Whenever you rest, you may add a card to your deck.

x10.name: Frozen Egg
x10.description: Upon pick up, choose and Upgrade a Power.

x12.name: Juzu Bracelet
x12.description: Regular enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.

x13.name: Lantern
x13.description: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.

x14.name: Molten Egg
x14.description: Upon pick up, choose and Upgrade an Attack.

x15.name: Oddly Smooth Stone
x15.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity.

x16.name: Omamori
x16.description: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.

x17.name: Orichalcum
x17.description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.

x18.name: Pen Nib
x18.description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.

x19.name: Prayer Wheel
x19.description: Non-Boss chests now also contain cards.

x20.name: Regal Pillow
x20.description: Heal an additional 15 HP when you Rest.

x21.name: Singing Bowl
x21.description: Whenever you skip a card reward, increase your Max HP by 2.

x22.name: Snecko Skull
x22.description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.

x24.name: Tiny Chest
x24.description: Gain 30 Gold. You are 10% more likely to find treasure in ? rooms.

x25.name: Toxic Egg
x25.description: Upon pick up, choose and Upgrade a Skill.

x26.name: Vajra
x26.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.

x27.name: War Paint
x27.description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Skills.

x28.name: Whetstone
x28.description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.

x29.name: Blue Candle
x29.description: Curse cards can now be played. Playing a Curse will make you lose 1 HP and Exhausts the card.

x30.name: Bottled Flame
x30.description: Upon pick up, choose an Attack card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

x31.name: Bottled Lightning
x31.description: Upon pick up, choose a Skill card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

x32.name: Bottled Tornado
x32.description: Upon pick up, choose a Power card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

x33.name: Centennial Puzzle
x33.description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

x34.name: Darkstone Periapt
x34.description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.

x35.name: Gremlin Horn
x35.description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.

x36.name: Kunai
x36.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

x37.name: Letter Opener
x37.description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

x38.name: Matryoshka
x38.description: The next 2 chests you open contain 2 Relics. (Excludes boss chests)

x39.name: Meat on the Bone
x39.description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

x40.name: Mercury Hourglass
x40.description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

x41.name: Mummified Hand
x41.description: Whenever you play a Power, a random card in your hand costs 0 for the turn.

x42.name: Ninja Scroll
x42.description: Start each combat with 3 Shivs in hand.

x43.name: Ornamental Fan
x43.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.

x44.name: Pantograph
x44.description: At the start of boss combats, heal 25 HP.

x45.name: Paper Krane
x45.description: Enemies with Weak deal 50% less damage rather than 25%.

x46.name: Paper Phrog
x46.description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

x48.name: Runic Dodecahedron
x48.description: If your HP is full, gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn.

x49.name: Self-Forming Clay
x49.description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 3 Block next turn.

x50.name: Shuriken
x50.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.

x51.name: Smiling Mask
x51.description: The merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.

x52.name: The Courier
x52.description: The merchant no longer runs out of cards, relics, or potions and his prices are reduced by 20%.

x53.name: Toolbox
x53.description: At the start of each combat, add a random colorless card to your hand.

x54.name: Tough Bandages
x54.description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.

x55.name: Bird-Faced Urn
x55.description: Whenever you play a Power, heal 2 HP.

x56.name: Calipers
x56.description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.

x57.name: Champion Belt
x57.description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.

x58.name: Charon's Ashes
x58.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

x59.name: Dead Branch
x59.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.

x60.name: Du-Vu Doll
x60.description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 additional Strength.

x61.name: Frozen Eye
x61.description: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.

x62.name: Gambling Chip
x62.description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards then draw that many.

x63.name: Ginger
x63.description: You can no longer become Weakened.

x64.name: Girya
x64.description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites. (3 times max)

x65.name: Ice Cream
x65.description: Energy is now conserved between turns.

x66.name: Magic Flower
x66.description: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.

x69.name: Peace Pipe
x69.description: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.

x70.name: Red Skull
x70.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.

x71.name: Shovel
x71.description: You can now Dig for loot at Rest Sites.

x72.name: Sundial
x72.description: Every 3 times you shuffle your deck, gain 2 Energy.

x73.name: Thread and Needle
x73.description: At the start of each combat, gain 5 Plated Armor.

x74.name: Tingsha
x74.description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

x75.name: Torii
x75.description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1.

x76.name: Unceasing Top
x76.description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

x77.name: Astrolabe
x77.description: Upon pickup, choose and Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.

x78.name: Black Blood
x78.description: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 10 HP.

x79.name: Black Star
x79.description: Elites now drop 2 Relics when defeated.

x81.name: Cursed Key
x81.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Whenever you open a non-boss chest, obtain a Curse.

x82.name: Ectoplasm
x82.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer gain Gold.

x83.name: Eternal Feather
x83.description: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 2 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.

x84.name: Lizard Tail
x84.description: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).

x85.name: Mark of Pain
x85.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Start combats with 2 Wounds in your draw pile.

x86.name: Orrery
x86.description: Choose and add 5 cards to your deck.

x88.name: Philosopher's Stone
x88.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 2 Strength.

x89.name: Question Card
x89.description: On Card Reward screens, choose from 4 cards instead of 3.

x90.name: Runic Cube
x90.description: Max HP is lowered by 20%. Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.

x91.name: Runic Dome
x91.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer see enemy Intents.

x92.name: Runic Pyramid
x92.description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand. Draw 1 less card each turn.

x93.name: Snecko Eye
x93.description: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Start each combat Confused.

x94.name: Sozu
x94.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer use potions.

x95.name: The Specimen
x95.description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.

x96.name: Tiny House
x96.description: Obtain 1 potion. Gain 30 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card.

x97.name: Velvet Choker
x97.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.

x99.name: Bloody Idol
x99.description: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.

x100.name: Enchiridion
x100.description: Start each combat with a random Power card in your hand. It costs 0 until the end of turn.

x102.name: Necronomicon
x102.description: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. When you take this relic, become Cursed.

x103.name: Neow's Lament
x103.description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.

x104.name: Nilry's Codex
x104.description: At the end of each turn, you can choose 1 of 3 random cards to shuffle into your draw pile.

x105.name: Nloth's Gift
x105.description: Triples the chance of receiving rare cards as monster rewards.

x106.name: Odd Mushroom
x106.description: When Vulnerable, take 25% more damage rather than 50%.

x107.name: Red Mask
x107.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

x110.name: Lee's Waffle
x110.description: Raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.

x111.name: Medical Kit
x111.description: Status cards can now be played. Playing a Status will Exhaust the card.

x112.name: Membership Card
x112.description: In future acts, shops appear 50% more often. BONUS: 20% discount on all products!

x113.name: Strange Spoon
x113.description: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.

x114.name: Toy Ornithopter
x114.description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 3 HP.
